help.name: mris_remesh
help.description: Remeshes a surface to a desired edge length, number of vertices, or average face area. One of the following mutually exclusive options must be specified on the commandline.

mutually-exclusive.explanation: target average edge length in mm for remeshed surface
target number of vertices for remeshed surface
control the decimation by specifying the desired average face area in mm2
improve the quality while only reducing vertices by a small amount
